on reading compounds: 亡命【ボウメイ】flight from one's country, seeking asylum, defection, emigration (for political reasons), (going into) exile, becoming a (political) refugee
亡夫【ボウフ】deceased husband, late husband
存亡【ソンボウ】life or death, existence, destiny
興亡【コウボウ】rise and fall, ups and downs
亡者【モウジャ】the dead, ghost, obsessed person (money, power, etc.)
亡者船【モウジャブネ】ship of the dead which appears if you go fishing the night of the Bon festival
kun reading compounds: 滅びる【ほろびる】to go to ruin, to go under, to fall, to be destroyed, to die out, to become extinct, to perish
滅ぶ【ほろぶ】to be ruined, to go under, to perish, to be destroyed
滅ぼす【ほろぼす】to destroy, to overthrow, to wreck, to ruin
